attributes.action: Make All Packaging Recyclable And From Other Material Other Than Plastic
attributes.additional_details:
We use way too much plastic for example
- loose fruit and veg bags 
-plastic bags 
- boxes lined in plastic 
- cereal bags 
- bottles which are usually only used once
- all unnecessary packaging of a produce which could easily be changed for a healthier material for our planet. If this is paper then it DOES NOT NEED TO BE LINED IN PLASTIC.
attributes.background: In our world today more and more plastic and non-recyclable materials are ending up in the sea and killing our wonderful creatures. Furthermore , the dumped materials release methane as they decompose which is a significant factor for climate change. We need to be using less plastic in our shops
